```{r setup}

library(knitr)
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE, tibble.width = 45)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE, 
  warning = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE, 
  error=FALSE, 
  comment = "#",
  fig.align = 'center', 
  fig.retina = 5,
  out.width = "80%",
  fig.show = 'hold',
  cache = FALSE
)

# libraries
library(biplotEZ)
```
